name: Tosculi Hive Queen
description: The Tosculi Hive Queen is a large, sinister monstrosity characterized by its formidable appearance, sharp scimitars, and a deadly stinger.
memorable: Able to implant eggs in incapacitated creatures, leading to their death after 30 days.
goals: To lead her hive and dominate opponents through combat strategy and debilitating effects.
relations: Commands various Tosculi underlings and can communicate telepathically with them.
environment: Typically found in dark, hidden hive locations, often in underground lairs.
strengths: Immunity to poison damage, good Dexterity for evasion, and the ability to paralyze enemies.
weaknesses: Relatively vulnerable to attacks that bypass its immunities.
attacks: Can make multiple scimitar attacks and a highly damaging stinger attack that also poisons and paralyzes opponents.
most_powerful_ability: Implanting an egg in a target that leads to a gruesome death when larval Tosculi hatches.
skills: Notably perceptive with a passive perception of 17.
additional_information: Can fly and reposition strategically in battle.
Legendary Resistance to succeed on failed saving throws.
Knows the direction and distance to hive members.
Can create a blinding cloud with Glitter Dust.
Highly tactical with an above-average intelligence.
test_queries: creature with powerful poison and paralysis
